title: Add logo and implement payment gateway with bank transfer details

requirements.text: Replace the header logo with the uploaded image 4_20240410_121533_0002.png showing 'Skills Bazzar' branding. Update the Header component to display this logo image instead of the current 'Evergreen Hub' text logo.
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded Skills Bazzar logo image is displayed in the header navigation
Logo is properly sized and maintains aspect ratio
Logo is clickable and navigates to homepage
Logo is responsive on mobile devices

requirements.text: Create a PaymentGateway component displaying India Post Payment Bank transfer details: Account Number 009910265673, Bank Name 'India Post Payment Bank', IFSC Code IPOS0000001, Account Holder Name 'Rudra Pratap Singh'. Include a prominent section explaining the manual bank transfer payment process.

quotes: make a payment gateway this is my account number:-009910265673 Bank :- India post payment bank IFSC code:-IPOS0000001 Name :- Rudra Pratap Singh

acceptanceCriteria: Payment gateway component displays all bank details clearly
Account number, IFSC code, and account holder name are prominently shown
Bank details are formatted in a clean, easy-to-copy layout
Instructions for manual bank transfer are included

requirements.text: Create a payment proof submission form allowing users to enter transaction ID and upload payment screenshot after making a bank transfer. This form should appear after a user clicks 'Buy Now' on any package card.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes fields for transaction ID and screenshot upload
Form validates that transaction ID is provided
Form validates that a screenshot file is uploaded
Form is shown in a modal or dedicated page after package selection
Successful submission creates a payment record with 'pending' status

requirements.text: Update the PricingSection 'Buy Now' buttons to open a payment modal showing the PaymentGateway bank details and payment proof submission form instead of directly linking to WhatsApp.
acceptanceCriteria: All package 'Buy Now' buttons open the payment modal
Payment modal displays bank transfer details
Payment modal includes the proof submission form
Selected package information is passed to the payment modal

requirements.text: Implement backend functionality to store payment proof submissions including userId, packageId, transactionId, screenshot blob data, and status (initially 'pending'). This leverages the existing Payment model and blob storage capabilities.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend accepts payment proof submissions from authenticated users
Screenshot images are stored as blobs in the backend
Payment records are created with status 'pending'
Transaction ID is stored with the payment record

constraints: Do not modify the existing Payment model structure in backend
Preserve the existing admin payment management functionality
Do not change the WhatsApp contact system for general inquiries
Maintain the green and black theme throughout new components
nonGoals: Automated payment verification or integration with payment APIs
Multiple payment methods beyond bank transfer
